name: I develop hobby projects whenever I have free time. As for ideas, I have no shortage of them.

I write blog articles on medium.com. I write about the projects that I have built, Some difficult-to-grasp Data Science and Machine Learning concepts and stuff that helps a developer in their daily lives.

I have a habit of helping young enthusiasts who want to pursue Computer Science or some specific niche in this domain. I have successfully mentored several people online (on personal basis ofc). My audience is spread across the world!
I just love reading research papers. Honestly speaking I'd go anywhere as long as they have good reading material but recently my go-to place have been IEEE Xplore.
I didn't go to any art school, just self taught myself to draw and here I am, sketching realistic faces of famous characters and drawing OCs.
